short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn URL into a short,using no 3rd party service but website itself.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool provides a simple solution for shortening URLs of eBay or Amazon listings without relying on third-party services. Have you ever encountered the problem of trying to share an eBay listing with a friend, only to find that the URL is extremely long and takes up multiple lines of text? Have you ever wondered why eBay or AmazonURLs are unnecessarily lengthy?

This extension offers a solution by allowing you to quickly generate a shortened version of the eBay or Amazon URL . This is particularly useful for easy sharing on social media and messaging platforms, and eliminates the need to deal with long, unwieldy URLs. Say goodbye to those multi-line URLs and streamline your sharing experience!
